headline: Was Jim Cramer Right About Adobe (ADBE) Stock?
summary: Back in 2024, on May 14, a caller on the Mad Money show asked about Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE), concerned about its 20% decline year-to-date and underperformance relative to its price targets at the time. The caller specifically wanted to know whether to hold or sell ahead of its upcoming earnings, to which Cramer replied with: […]
